field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the name of the file.
field.required: You must enter a name for this file

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter a description for the file

field.label: Author
field.hint: Enter the author's name (Family name, Given names).

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them here.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Series/Report No.
field.hint: Enter the series and number assigned to this item by your community.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type of content of the item.
field.required: You must choose at least one type.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item.

field.label: Sponsors
field.hint: Enter the names of any sponsors and/or funding codes in the box.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

relation-field.label: Author
relation-field.hint: Enter the author's name (Family name, Given names).

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them here.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Series/Report No.
field.hint: Enter the series and number assigned to this item by your community.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.
field.required: You must choose at least one type.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

relation-field.label: Publication
relation-field.hint: import a publicaton

field.label: Last name
field.hint: Enter the last name of the person

field.label: First name
field.hint: Enter the first name of the person

field.label: Email
field.hint: Enter the email of the person

field.label: ORCID
field.hint: Enter the ORCID of the person (e.g., 0000-0000-0000-0000)

field.label: Birth date
field.hint: Enter the birth date of the person

field.label: Job title
field.hint: Enter the job title of the person

field.label: Name
field.hint: Enter the name of the project

field.label: ID
field.hint: Enter the id of the project

relation-field.label: Funding Agency
relation-field.hint: Enter the funding agency name.

relation-field.label: Coordinator Organization
relation-field.hint: Enter the coordinating organization's name

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: Enter the keywords of the project

field.label: Start date
field.hint: Enter the start date of the project

field.label: End date
field.hint: Enter the end date of the project

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter the description of the project

field.label: Name
field.hint: Enter the name of the orgunit

field.label: ID
field.hint: Enter the id of the orgunit

field.label: Acronym
field.hint: Enter the acronym or short name of the organization

field.label: Website
field.hint: Enter the website URL of the organization

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter the description of the orgunit

field.label: Name
field.hint: Enter the name of the journal

field.label: Editor
field.hint: Enter the editor of the journal

field.label: ISSN
field.hint: Enter the issn of the journal

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter the description of the journal

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the publisher of the journal

relation-field.label: Journal
relation-field.hint: Select the journal related to this volume.

field.label: Name
field.hint: Enter the name of the journal volume

field.label: Volume
field.hint: Enter the volume of the journal volume

field.label: Issue date
field.hint: Enter the issue date of the journal volume

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter the description of the journal volume

relation-field.label: Journal Volume
relation-field.hint: Select the journal volume related to this issue.

field.label: Name
field.hint: Enter the name of the journal issue

field.label: Number
field.hint: Enter the number of the journal issue

field.label: Issue date
field.hint: Enter the issue date of the journal issue

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter the description of the journal issue

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: Enter the keywords of the journal issue

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the publication.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this publication.

field.label: Subtitle
field.hint: Add any subtitle associated with the publication.

field.label: Abbreviated Title
field.hint: Provide abbreviations or short titles used for this publication.

relation-field.label: Author
relation-field.hint: Link an author entity or type a free-text author name.
relation-field.required: At least one author (relationship or text) is required.

relation-field.label: Editor
relation-field.hint: Link an editor or record the editor name.

relation-field.label: Contributor
relation-field.hint: Link other contributors such as translators or illustrators.

relation-field.label: Publisher
relation-field.hint: Link the publishing organisation or add a free-text publisher name.

field.label: Publication Date
field.hint: Provide the publication date (year is required; month and day are optional).

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the primary language of the publication.

field.label: Access Rights
field.hint: Specify how this publication can be accessed.

field.label: Version
field.hint: Select the version of the publication.

field.label: Resource Type
field.hint: Choose the resource type that best describes this publication.
field.required: Select at least one resource type.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: Add identifiers such as DOI, ISSN or ISBN.

relation-field.label: Parent Publication
relation-field.hint: Link the journal, book or proceedings this publication belongs to.

field.label: Volume
field.hint: Enter the volume number where applicable.

field.label: Issue
field.hint: Enter the issue number where applicable.

field.label: Start Page
field.hint: Enter the first page for the publication.

field.label: End Page
field.hint: Enter the last page for the publication.

field.label: License
field.hint: Select the license applied to this publication.

field.label: License URI
field.hint: Provide the URI of the license if available.

field.label: Preferred Citation
field.hint: Record the preferred bibliographic citation for this publication.

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: Add subject keywords for this publication.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Provide the abstract or summary of the publication.

relation-field.label: Related Project
relation-field.hint: Link projects that funded or generated this publication.

relation-field.label: Funding Scheme
relation-field.hint: Link funding programmes supporting this publication.

relation-field.label: Referenced Dataset or Software
relation-field.hint: Link research products referenced by this publication.

relation-field.label: Referenced Publication
relation-field.hint: Link related publications cited by this work.

relation-field.label: Related Event
relation-field.hint: Link events such as conferences or workshops associated with this publication.

field.label: Embargo End Date
field.hint: Set the embargo end date when access is restricted.

field.label: Additional Description
field.hint: Include any supplementary description.

field.label: Family Name
field.hint: Enter the family or last name.

field.label: Given Name
field.hint: Enter the personal or first name.

field.label: Display Name
field.hint: Provide the preferred display name for this person.

field.label: Job Title
field.hint: Enter the current job title or role.

field.label: Birth Date
field.hint: Provide the birth date where relevant.

field.label: Languages
field.hint: List known languages using IETF language codes (e.g. en, pt-BR).

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: Add persistent identifiers such as ORCID, ResearcherID, Scopus Author ID, etc.

field.label: Email
field.hint: Enter one or more email addresses.

field.label: Electronic Address
field.hint: Capture additional electronic contacts such as profiles or websites.

field.label: Telephone
field.hint: Provide telephone numbers when applicable.

field.label: Fax
field.hint: Add fax numbers if relevant.

field.label: Affiliation (text)
field.hint: Record affiliation names when a relationship link is not available.

relation-field.label: Affiliated Organisation
relation-field.hint: Link organisational units associated with this person.

relation-field.label: Authored Publication
relation-field.hint: Link publications authored by this person.

relation-field.label: Edited Publication
relation-field.hint: Link publications edited by this person.

relation-field.label: Other Publication Contribution
relation-field.hint: Link publications where this person contributed in another role.

relation-field.label: Created Product
relation-field.hint: Link research products created by this person.

relation-field.label: Product Contribution
relation-field.hint: Link products to which this person contributed.

relation-field.label: Project Participation
relation-field.hint: Link projects where this person participated.

relation-field.label: Principal Investigator Role
relation-field.hint: Link projects where this person served as principal investigator.

relation-field.label: Event Participation
relation-field.hint: Link events such as conferences or workshops associated with this person.

field.label: Project Title
field.hint: Enter the full title of the project.

field.label: Acronym
field.hint: Provide the short name or acronym.

field.label: Project Reference
field.hint: Add grant agreement or project reference numbers.

field.label: Project Website
field.hint: Enter the public project website (if available).

field.label: Other Identifiers
field.hint: Add any additional identifiers associated with the project.

field.label: Grant DOI
field.hint: Enter any grant DOIs assigned to the project.

field.label: Start Date
field.hint: Specify the project start date.

field.label: End Date
field.hint: Specify the project end date.

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: Add keywords describing the project.

field.label: Project Description
field.hint: Provide a brief abstract or summary of the project.

field.label: Funding Stream
field.hint: Record the funding stream or programme name.

field.label: Open Access Mandate
field.hint: Indicate whether the project is subject to an open access mandate.

field.label: Mandate URL
field.hint: Provide a link to the open access policy, if available.

relation-field.label: Funding Organisation
relation-field.hint: Link organisations funding this project.

relation-field.label: Funding Scheme
relation-field.hint: Link funding programmes or calls associated with the project.

relation-field.label: Coordinator
relation-field.hint: Link the organisation coordinating the project.

relation-field.label: Consortium Partner
relation-field.hint: Link partner organisations in the project consortium.

relation-field.label: Project Researcher
relation-field.hint: Link researchers participating in this project.

relation-field.label: Principal Investigator
relation-field.hint: Link principal investigators for this project.

relation-field.label: Equipment
relation-field.hint: Link equipment used in the project.

relation-field.label: Related Publication
relation-field.hint: Link publications produced by this project.

relation-field.label: Related Product
relation-field.hint: Link datasets, software or other products generated by this project.

relation-field.label: Related Event
relation-field.hint: Link conferences or events organised or funded by this project.

field.label: Organization Name
field.hint: Enter the full name of the organisation.

field.label: Acronym
field.hint: Optionally provide the short name or acronym.

field.label: Organization Identifier
field.hint: Select the identifier type and provide the corresponding value.

field.label: Website
field.hint: Enter the primary website or contact URL.

field.label: Organization Role
field.hint: Describe the role played by this organisation.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Summarize the organisation’s mission or activities.

relation-field.label: Parent Organisation
relation-field.hint: Link to the parent organisation, if applicable.

relation-field.label: Affiliated People
relation-field.hint: Associate people affiliated with this organisation.

relation-field.label: Funded Projects
relation-field.hint: Link projects funded by this organisation.

relation-field.label: Coordinated Projects
relation-field.hint: Link projects coordinated by this organisation.

relation-field.label: Consortium Projects
relation-field.hint: Link projects where this organisation is a partner.

relation-field.label: Published Outputs
relation-field.hint: Link publications published by this organisation.

relation-field.label: Funding Schemes
relation-field.hint: Associate funding programmes managed by this organisation.

relation-field.label: Research Equipment
relation-field.hint: Link equipment operated by this organisation.

field.label: Product Title
field.hint: Name or title of the research product.

field.label: Product Type
field.hint: Select the type of product.

field.label: Version
field.hint: Provide version details, if applicable.

field.label: Access Rights
field.hint: Specify the access conditions for the product.

field.label: DOI
field.hint: Add any Digital Object Identifiers for the product.

field.label: Product URL
field.hint: Provide access URLs for the product.

field.label: Additional Identifiers
field.hint: List any other identifiers (catalog numbers, internal IDs, etc.).

field.label: Description
field.hint: Describe the product, its scope, and content.

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: Add subject keywords for discovery.

field.label: Collection Start
field.hint: Start date for data collection (if relevant).

field.label: Collection End
field.hint: End date for data collection.

field.label: Availability Date
field.hint: Date when the product became available.

field.label: License
field.hint: Select the licence applied to the product.

field.label: License URL
field.hint: Provide the licence URI, if not covered above.

relation-field.label: Creators (People)
relation-field.hint: Link people responsible for creating the product.

relation-field.label: Creators (Organisations)
relation-field.hint: Link organisations involved in creating the product.

relation-field.label: Contributors (People)
relation-field.hint: Link individuals who contributed to the product.

relation-field.label: Contributors (Organisations)
relation-field.hint: Link organisations contributing to the product.

relation-field.label: Hosting Organisations
relation-field.hint: Link organisations hosting or curating the product.

relation-field.label: Originating Projects
relation-field.hint: Link projects that produced this product.

relation-field.label: Funding Schemes
relation-field.hint: Link funding programmes that supported the product.

relation-field.label: Generating Equipment
relation-field.hint: Link equipment used to generate or capture the product.

relation-field.label: Related Publications
relation-field.hint: Link publications describing or referencing this product.

relation-field.label: Parent Product
relation-field.hint: Link a parent product when this is a component.

field.label: Funding Programme
field.hint: Enter the full name of the funding scheme.

field.label: Acronym
field.hint: Provide the short name or acronym.

field.label: Funding Type
field.hint: Select the stage or type of funding.

field.label: Identifier
field.hint: Add grant numbers or registry identifiers.

field.label: Grant DOI
field.hint: List DOIs assigned to this funding.

field.label: Start Date
field.hint: Start date of the funding availability.

field.label: End Date
field.hint: End date of the funding availability.

field.label: Open Access Mandate
field.hint: Indicate whether the funding enforces an OA mandate.

field.label: Mandate URL
field.hint: Link to the policy describing the OA mandate.

relation-field.label: Parent Funding
relation-field.hint: Link a parent programme or umbrella scheme.

relation-field.label: Supported Projects
relation-field.hint: Link projects financed by this funding.

relation-field.label: Resulting Publications
relation-field.hint: Link publications acknowledging this funding.

relation-field.label: Resulting Products
relation-field.hint: Link datasets, software, or other products funded.

relation-field.label: Managing Organisations
relation-field.hint: Link organisations administering the funding.

field.label: Equipment Name
field.hint: Provide the name or description of the equipment.

field.label: Equipment Type
field.hint: Select the category that best fits this equipment.

field.label: Identifier
field.hint: Record inventory or registration identifiers.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Describe the equipment, specifications, and usage.

relation-field.label: Operating Organisations
relation-field.hint: Link organisations responsible for operating the equipment.

relation-field.label: Associated Projects
relation-field.hint: Link projects that make use of this equipment.

relation-field.label: Generated Products
relation-field.hint: Link datasets or outputs generated using this equipment.
